verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Oh, wonderful love that takes me, Though wretched and stained with sin! Oh, marvelous grace that makes me All holy and pure within!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Oh, mighty power that holds me, A helper forever near! Oh, perfect peace that folds me In danger and storm and fear!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Oh, jubilant joy sustaining My faltering steps to the last! Oh, rapturous rest remaining When toiling and tears are past!

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Oh, matchless mercy that rates me Joint-heirs with the sinless Son! Oh, golden glory that waits me When tempests and clouds are done!

verse.name: v5
